div.p: Dear godfather Froschauer, provide copies of the recently published Confession to the following: Mr. Wolfgang Haller:
Zurich to my gracious lords 12 German, which he is to give to a mayor, as I have agreed with him; Bern 12, namely 6 Latin and 6 German; Biel 12, namely 4 Latin and 8 German; Geneva 6, all Latin.
Mr. Rudolf Walthard: Schaffhausen 12, namely 6 Latin and 6 German; Basel 12, namely 6 Latin, 6 German; Mulhouse 12, namely 4 Latin, 8 German.

Heinrich Bullinger: to the Count Palatine 12, 6 Latin, 6 German; to the Landgrave 6, namely 2 Latin, 4 German; St. Gallen 12, namely 6 Latin, 6 German; Chur 12, namely 6 Latin, 6 German. All these copies, which are in total 120, my dear godfather Mr. Wolfgang Haller should pay for from the student office, as my lords have recognized. March 9, 1566.
